laboratory_examinations.findings: Revealed a cystic opacity in the major fissure, apparently attached to the pericardium. A 1-cm nodule was also detected in the right lower lobe.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Two months later, a new moderate-sized right-sided pleural effusion and an increase in the size of the cyst was observed.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Revealed an exudate with no malignant cells detected.
